thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jeffrey C
title: Great location
text: This is a fine property with an attentive staff. The breakfast has a good selection. The elevator is tiny and slow. The bed was comfortable and the room had a window that opened. The location is very near the Louvre Rivoli metro stop and within walking distance to all of the key art museums. The rooms are quite small and the room temperature is set too high for me. The shower is small. The facility is clean but small by American standards.
